remarks: Stoic logic Thema 4 version b. This is version b, which is with the phrase "or both".  See ~ stoic4a for more information.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 17-Feb-2019.)
statement:
stoic4b.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
stoic4b.2 $e |- ( ( ( ch /\ ph /\ ps ) /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
stoic4b $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
